did.abstract: Personal and business papers of Butner, consisting of personal letters, including one of 1855 describing a balloon ascension at Salem, N.C.; correspondence relating to education in North Carolina and school affairs in Forsyth County; rough minutes of the Forsyth County Board of Education, 1890-1895; and a temporary school register for Bethania Public School, 1904-1905. Correspondents include John Franklin Heitman and J.W. Giles.
